SCTX:
Begin BILL_MarksDwvGhostSummon
; Summon an Dwarven Ghost when a cursed Dwarven coin is pulled from a skull
;
; script location: should be placed on a Dwarven Coin stuck in a skull

;fixed 03/20. Could still be wierdness.

; variables
short done

if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	if ( done == 1 )
		Activate
		return
	else
		PlaceAtPC "dwarven ghost", 1, 128, 1
		; 1 of them, 256 units away, in back (1) of the player
		set done to 1
		Activate
	endif
endif

End
